description: Number of partitions of n into 7 squares.
links: Alois P. Heinz, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..10000
maple: b:= proc(n, i, t) option remember; `if`(n=0, 1,      `if`(i<1 or t<1, 0, b(n, i-1, t)+      `if`(i^2>n, 0, b(n-i^2, i, t-1))))    end:a:= n-> b(n, isqrt(n), 7):seq(a(n), n=0..120);  # _Alois P. Heinz_, May 30 2014
mathematica: b[n_, i_, t_] := b[n, i, t] = If[n == 0, 1, If[i<1 || t<1, 0, b[n, i-1, t] + If[i^2 > n, 0, b[n-i^2, i, t-1]]]]; a[n_] := b[n, Sqrt[n] // Floor, 7]; Table[a[n], {n, 0, 120}] (* _Jean-Fran√ßois Alcover_, Jun 11 2015, after _Alois P. Heinz_ *)
author: _David W. Wilson_
